text: @ScottPresler @DebbieB93016464 @CPAC I used to get pneumonia all the time, nearly every year since I was 6 months the old.  About 4 years ago I started working on improving gut bacteria by drinking kombucha daily and I haven't had so much as a sniffle since.  Maybe give it a try
